document.full_text: europe is likely to be hit the hardest among major economies by a potential global slowdown in 2012, but china's $300 billion sovereign wealth fund is still looking for investment opportunities there, its head said on saturday.
document.title: china sovereign wealth fund eyeing europe despite risks
lines_and_colors: europe is likely to be hit the hardest among major economies by a potential global slowdown in 2012, but china's $300 billion sovereign wealth fund is still looking for investment opportunities there, its head said on saturday.
